comments.content:
"AWS responsibility “Security of the Cloud” - AWS is responsible for protecting the infrastructure that runs all of the services offered in the AWS Cloud. This infrastructure is composed of the hardware, software, networking, and facilities that run AWS Cloud services."

https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/shared-responsibility-model/#:~:text=AWS%20responsibility%20%E2%80%9CSecurity%20of%20the%20Cloud%E2%80%9D%20%2D%20AWS%20is%20responsible%20for%20protecting%20the%20infrastructure%20that%20runs%20all%20of%20the%20services%20offered%20in%20the%20AWS%20Cloud.%20This%20infrastructure%20is%20composed%20of%20the%20hardware%2C%20software%2C%20networking%2C%20and%20facilities%20that%20run%20AWS%20Cloud%20services.

questions.question_text:
A company plans to move its test workloads to Amazon EC2. The test workloads can be interrupted and are not required to start at a particular time.

Which EC2 instance purchasing option is MOST cost-effective for this use case?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Spot Instances
Spot Insatnce

Selected Answer: B
can be interrupted - spot

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-spot-instances.html

Selected Answer: C
A. AWS Direct Connect - according to the documentation this can take several weeks to set up with a local provider. 
B. Amazon VPC - this is primarily used for subnetting internal instances. 
C. AWS Site-to-Site VPN - can be set up in minutes from branch / data center to aws. 
D. Edge location - these are mainly content based distribution hubs for end users/clients.

Selected Answer: C
The solution that will meet the requirements of setting up a secure network connection from on-premises to AWS Cloud within a week is AWS Site-to-Site VPN (C).

AWS Site-to-Site VPN is a secure and scalable solution that enables you to establish a secure and reliable connection between your on-premises data center and the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) in the cloud. With Site-to-Site VPN, you can encrypt all traffic between your on-premises network and your Amazon VPC to ensure secure and reliable connectivity.

a 
AWS Direct Connect will meet the company's requirements for setting up a secure network connection from on premises to the AWS Cloud within 1 week. Direct Connect provides a dedicated network connection from on premises to AWS, bypassing the public internet, which enhances security and reliability.

Selected Answer: C
AWS Site-to-Site VPN is a managed VPN service that enables secure communication between on-premises data centers or branch offices and Amazon VPCs. It uses standard VPN protocols and can be set up quickly using the AWS Management Console or APIs. The service supports IPsec VPN connections, which can be established over the internet and provides strong security for the communication between on-premises infrastructure and AWS resources.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

questions.question_text:
A company wants to set up a secure network connection from on premises to the AWS Cloud within 1 week.

Which solution will meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Service Catalog
"AWS Service Catalog allows IT administrators to create, manage, and distribute catalogs of approved products to end users, who can then access the products they need in a personalized portal."
https://aws.amazon.com/servicecatalog/faqs/

Selected Answer: B
AWS Service Catalog allows organizations to create and manage catalogs of IT services that are approved for use on AWS. These catalogs can include everything from simple virtual machine images to multi-tier applications and services. Users can quickly and easily launch pre-approved services from the catalog, without needing to go through the procurement and provisioning processes typically associated with IT service delivery.

Selected Answer: B
Service Catalog works for this
